mapper.sql: id, draw_code drawCode, draw_type drawType, code, user_type userType, realname, bankname, banknum, bankaddress, bank_branch bankBranch, money, cash_withdrawal_fee cashWithdrawalFee, total_money totalMoney, add_time addTime, status, remark, draw_time drawTime, verify_id verifyId, verify_name verifyName, verify_time verifyTime, verify_status verifyStatus, finance_id financeId, finance_name financeName, finance_time financeTime, finance_status financeStatus, draw_name drawName
mapper.update: update ecm_mzf_draw set status = #{status}, verify_status = #{verifyStatus}, verify_id = #{verifyId}, verify_name = #{verifyName}, verify_time = #{verifyTime}, draw_name = #{drawName} where draw_code = #{drawCode}

update ecm_mzf_draw set status = #{status}, verify_status=#{verifyStatus}, verify_id=#{verifyId}, verify_name=#{verifyName}, verify_time=#{verifyTime}, remark=#{remark}, draw_name = #{drawName} where draw_code = #{drawCode}
UPDATE ecm_mzf_draw_water dw SET dw.`status`=#{status} WHERE dw.`draw_code`=#{drawCode};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ecm_mzf_draw ( draw_code, draw_type, code, user_type, realname, bankname, banknum, bankaddress, bank_branch, money, cash_withdrawal_fee, total_money, add_time, draw_time ) VALUES ( #{drawCode}, #{drawType}, #{code}, #{userType}, #{realname}, #{bankname}, #{banknum}, #{bankaddress}, #{bankBranch}, #{money}, #{cashWithdrawalFee}, #{totalMoney}, #{addTime}, #{drawTime} )

update ecm_mzf_draw
draw_code = #{drawCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
draw_type = #{drawType,jdbcType=BIT},

realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bankname = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ecm_mzf_draw set draw_code = #{drawCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, draw_type = #{drawType,jdbcType=BIT}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=BIT}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankname = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banknum = #{banknum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankaddress = #{bankaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_branch = #{bankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cash_withdrawal_fee = #{cashWithdrawalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, draw_time = #{drawTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, verify_id = #{verifyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, verify_name = #{verifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verify_time = #{verifyTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, verify_status = #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, finance_id = #{financeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finance_name = #{financeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finance_time = #{financeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finance_status = #{financeStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, draw_name = #{drawName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
